basic_info.name: Nabil Fadhilah
basic_info.title: Product Manager
basic_info.summary: Product Owner with over 2 years of experience in the tech startup industry. Skilled in product and project management, leading cross-functional teams, and aligning stakeholder expectations. Proficient in user needs analysis, workflow design, and implementing effective tech solutions. A fast learner with strong attention to detail and adaptability to change to ensure business goals are met efficiently.

experiences.title: Product Owner
responsibilities: Managed the entire project lifecycle from requirement gathering to post-launch maintenance.
Created flowcharts, UML diagrams, Use Cases, and BPMN to articulate user requirements in detail.
Led sprint planning, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups using the Scrum methodology.
Prioritized features through backlog grooming and MVP validation.
Collaborated cross-functionally with design, technical, QA teams, and external clients.
Provided regular updates to stakeholders and maintained realistic client expectations.
Drafted and managed BRD/PRD documents and documented all scope changes.
Trained end-users and prepared comprehensive training documentation.
Managed risks and change to ensure project delivery on time and within budget.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
responsibilities: Collaborated with fellow developers and stakeholders to ensure timely project completion.
Designed UX/UI prototypes aligned with stakeholder needs and expectations.
Architected and implemented various APIs to enable seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.
Utilized HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP (Laravel) for application development.

technical_skills: Project Management & SDLC (Agile, Kanban, Waterfall, Scrum)

educations.faculty: Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science

projects.title: Maintenance & Inventory Management
projects.description: Led the development of web and mobile systems for reporting machine repairs, preventive maintenance, and inventory management in the manufacturing sector.

projects.title: Speech To Text
projects.description: Led the maintenance of web and mobile speech-to-text systems for machine accuracy reporting in the manufacturing sector.

projects.title: MIS E-Procurement
projects.description: Led the development of a procurement system for BPDLH (Indonesiaâ€™s Environmental Fund Management Agency under the Ministry of Finance), enhancing efficiency and transparency in the procurement process.

projects.title: MIS Fasilitas Dana Bergulir
projects.description: Directed the development of web and mobile platforms for funding distribution and loans to agricultural institutions and farmer groups, enhancing financial access and agricultural productivity.

projects.title: KSP
projects.description: Designed a monitoring and evaluation system for KSP loan disbursement, improving efficiency and transparency.

projects.title: Docu
projects.description: Developed an information system for strategic marketing services, creating new job opportunities for freelancers.

projects.title: Gokarang
projects.description: Developed a web-based information system for tourism and coral reef conservation in Karawang and Indramayu, using PHP Native and Laravel.
